explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, there is a white oven with a black stovetop on top. On the right side of the frame is a white cabinet with glass windows.
[0-3] Then, a man wearing a black shirt and black pants walks to the stovetop and picks up a frying pan containing a flatbread.
